title: NPM debug and chalk packages compromised
author: universesquid
aiHeadline: NPM packages 'debug' and 'chalk' compromised, proving that even your debugging tools can't escape the chaos of the internet.

title: Signal Secure Backups
author: keyboardJones
aiHeadline: Signal introduces 'Secure Backups,' because what could go wrong with storing your messages in the cloud? Nothing, right?

title: Chat Control Must Be Stopped
author: Improvement
aiHeadline: Activists demand end to 'Chat Control,' because who needs privacy when the government can just read everything you say?

title: 14 Killed in anti-government protests in Nepal
author: whatsupdog
aiHeadline: 14 killed in Nepal as protests rage over social media ban, proving that people will always find a way to argue online, even if it means risking their lives.

title: Meta suppressed research on child safety, employees say
author: mdhb
aiHeadline: Meta allegedly suppresses child safety research, because what's a few more exploited kids when you're trying to make VR the next big thing?
